about_the_game: Join Player One as he navigates the haunted maze of Gummy park. Struggling with lost memories, Player One must solve intricate puzzles, unravel the mysteries of his past, and confront terrifying mascot monsters. Equipped with a slingshot and dynamite, he'll need to use every tool at his disposal to defend himself and survive the horrors that lurk around every corner. Can Player One uncover the truth and escape the nightmare? The maze holds more than just twists and turns—it holds the key to his forgotten memories.
detailed_description: Join Player One as he navigates the haunted maze of Gummy park. Struggling with lost memories, Player One must solve intricate puzzles, unravel the mysteries of his past, and confront terrifying mascot monsters. Equipped with a slingshot and dynamite, he'll need to use every tool at his disposal to defend himself and survive the horrors that lurk around every corner. Can Player One uncover the truth and escape the nightmare? The maze holds more than just twists and turns—it holds the key to his forgotten memories.
name: Gummy Nightmares Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5‑8260U Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Step into the enigmatic world of Gummy Nightmares as a little boy who wakes up in a mysterious amusement park with no memory. Explore, solve puzzles, and uncover lost memories while evading sinister plushie robots. Use weapons, set traps, and find hideouts to survive and reveal the truth.
